Class LinearMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearMatrix

  • public class LinearMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is designed to simulate a mathematical matrix. -- Class is thread safe; more advanced users should feel free to multithread. -- It is highly recommended to program with this class in Eclipse -- To use class, simply drag and drop this class into the project icon in the Eclipse side bar -- Please remember to use a machine epsilon to compare two values. Do not compare to double values directly! Wikipedia has a good article on the subject.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sid Masih -- Copyright 2015, licensed to La Jolla Country Day School

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearMatrix()
      creates an empty matrix with dimensions of 0 X 0
      LinearMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      create matrix with dimensions of rows X cols

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillMatrixWithValue(double value)
      fills matrix with specified value
      double get(int rows, int cols)
      simply returns value at a location in the matrix
      int getNumCols() 
      int getNumRows() 
      void printMatrix()
      helper method used to only print a matrix for test purposes -- check with instructor before using
      void resizeMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      resizes matrix without destroying values
      void set(int rows, int cols, double value)
      set a position in the matrix to a certain double value
      void setMatrix(int rows, int cols)
      destroys old matrix and creates new one with dimensions of rows X cols old matrix WILL be destroyed

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Returns:

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(int rows,
             int cols)
        destroys old matrix and creates new one with dimensions of rows X cols old matrix WILL be destroyed
        Parameters:
        rows - integer value of rows in matrix
        cols - integer value of cols in matrix

      • get

        public double get(int rows,
         int cols)
        simply returns value at a location in the matrix
        Parameters:
        rows - row value
        cols - col value
        Returns:
        double value from matrix from position rows X cols

      • set

        public void set(int rows,
       int cols,
       double value)
        set a position in the matrix to a certain double value
        Parameters:
        rows - row value
        cols - col value
        value - value to be set at the location rows X cols

      • printMatrix

        public void printMatrix()
        helper method used to only print a matrix for test purposes -- check with instructor before using

      • fillMatrixWithValue

        public void fillMatrixWithValue(double value)
        fills matrix with specified value
        Parameters:
        value - value that all positions in matrix will be set to

      • resizeMatrix

        public void resizeMatrix(int rows,
                int cols)
        resizes matrix without destroying values
        Parameters:
        rows - total number of new rows
        cols - total number of new cols
